title: PreQing position choosing for regular
body:
The new way to q for ranked of choosing your position first sounds like a great idea and I would kind of like to see it in regular as well. 
I'm over having to leave character select and wait 5 mins or more for having to leave before the game starts and get everyone to re Q or face a miserable game with people who Instant lock a champion that for a position that you or someone else has already called and doesn't fit in.
It would also fix the having to rush to press "ctrl" "v" to say the position you want have having to miss out if you aren't quick enough.

Little rant I know but choosing your position when you Q would make sure games run so much more smoothly and a lot less conflict.
